member.name: M:Raven.Client.AdvancedSessionExtensions.GetDatabaseCommands(Raven.Client.IAdvancedDocumentSessionOperations)
member.summary: Provides access to DatabaseCommands for the same database that the session was opened for.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.AdvancedSessionExtensions.GetDatabaseName(Raven.Client.IAdvancedDocumentSessionOperations)
member.summary: Gets the database name that the session was opened for.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.AdvancedSessionExtensions.AddCascadeDeleteReference(Raven.Client.IAdvancedDocumentSessionOperations,System.Object,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds one or more document keys to an entity's cascade delete metadata. Requires the cascade delete bundle on the server.
member.param: One or more keys to foreign documents.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Connection.DocumentExtensions.DocumentExists(Raven.Client.Connection.IDatabaseCommands,System.String)
member.summary: Checks the database to see if a document with the id specified exists.
member.param: The database commands instance for a particular database.
member.returns: True if the document exists, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Connection.DocumentExtensions.DocumentExists(Raven.Client.IAdvancedDocumentSessionOperations,System.String)
member.summary: Checks the database to see if a document with the id specified exists.
member.param: The advanced session instance for a particular database.
member.returns: True if the document exists, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.DocumentIdExtensions.GetDocumentKeyPrefix``1(Raven.Client.IDocumentStore)
member.summary: Gets the document key prefix for the given entity type.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.DocumentIdExtensions.DocumentIdMatches``1(Raven.Client.IDocumentStore,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the document id specified is valid for the given entity type.
member.returns: True if the id is valid, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.DocumentIdExtensions.GetStringIdFor``1(Raven.Client.IDocumentStore,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a string id for an entity, given an integer id.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.DocumentIdExtensions.GetStringIdFor``1(Raven.Client.IDocumentStore,System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a string id for an entity, given a guid id.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.DocumentIdExtensions.GetIntegerIdFor``1(Raven.Client.IDocumentStore,System.String)
member.summary: Safely gets the integer portion of a string identifier for a particular entity type.
member.param: The string id, such as foos/1.
member.exception: Thrown if the inputs are not valid.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.DocumentIdExtensions.GetGuidIdFor``1(Raven.Client.IDocumentStore,System.String)
member.summary: Safely gets the guid portion of a string identifier for a particular entity type, when guid ids are used.
member.exception: Thrown if the inputs are not valid.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.DocumentIdExtensions.GetDocumentIdParts(Raven.Client.IDocumentStore,System.String)
member.summary: Splits a composite document id into its parts for easy consumption.
member.param: The string id, such as foos/1/bar/2/whatever.
member.returns: An array of strings with each part as a separate element.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.DocumentIdExtensions.GenerateIdFor``1(Raven.Client.IAdvancedDocumentSessionOperations)
member.summary: Generates a document id using the registered conventions, such as the Raven HiLo generator. Returns the id without applying it to any particular entity, thus allowing you to pre-generate the id. Useful for detached operations, such as in CQRS. For example, the id could be generated ahead of time, returned to the caller, then used in a command message. The entity would then be created in a command handler, using the id from the message. There are other scenarios that this can also be useful.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.PagingExtensions.GetAllResultsWithPaging``1(Raven.Client.Linq.IRavenQueryable{``0},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes the query and iterates over every page, returning all results.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.PagingExtensions.GetAllDocumentKeysWithPaging``1(Raven.Client.Linq.IRavenQueryable{``0},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes the query and iterates over every page, returning all document keys that matched the query.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.PagingExtensions.ForEachWithPaging``1(Raven.Client.Linq.IRavenQueryable{``0},System.Action{``0},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes the query and iterates over every page. As each page is retrieved, the action is executed on the items for that page.

member.name: T:Raven.Client.Listeners.CreatedDateListener
member.summary: A client-side listener that adds a Created metadata value to every document being stored. Uses the clock on the client. For better precision, use a server-side trigger instead.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.TenantDatabaseExtensions.DatabaseExists(Raven.Client.IDocumentStore,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the database with the given name exists.
member.param: The name of the database to check for.
member.returns: True if the database exists, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.QueryExtensions.SyncCutoff``1(Raven.Client.Linq.IRavenQueryable{``0})
member.summary: Modifies the query such that repeat calls use the same cutoff time as the first call. Useful when paginating over results obtained with WaitForNonStaleResultsAsOfNow so that all pages use the same now.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.QueryExtensions.MetadataOnly(Raven.Client.IDocumentQueryCustomization)
member.summary: When running in server mode, customizes the query to return only metadata - conserving http bandwidth. Does nothing when running in embedded mode.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.QueryExtensions.OrderBy``1(Raven.Client.Linq.IRavenQueryable{``0},System.String[])
member.summary: Order the results by the specified fields The fields are the names of the fields to sort, defaulting to sorting by ascending. You can prefix a field name with '-' to indicate sorting by descending or '+' to sort by ascending

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.QueryExtensions.OrderByDescending``1(Raven.Client.Linq.IRavenQueryable{``0},System.String[])
member.summary: Order the results by the specified fields The fields are the names of the fields to sort, defaulting to sorting by descending. You can prefix a field name with '-' to indicate sorting by descending or '+' to sort by ascending

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.QueryExtensions.SkipTransformResults(Raven.Client.IDocumentQueryCustomization)
member.summary: Customizes the query such that any transform results function defined on the index will not be executed, returning just the raw results instead.

member.name: M:Raven.Client.Linq.QueryExtensions.SkipTransformResults``2(Raven.Client.IDocumentQueryBase{``0,``1})
member.summary: Customizes the query such that any transform results function defined on the index will not be executed, returning just the raw results instead.
